publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2245 Mike Rumbles: Pay-outs from Skipton Fund—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement of pay-outs of £20,000 to 400 people infected by hepatitis C through transfusion of infected blood products; notes that it was pressure from the Parliament which forced the UK Government to act, and further notes that, without devolution, these £8 million payments would not be happening. Supported by: George Lyon*, Iain Smith*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Donald Gorrie*, Mike Pringle*, Jeremy Purvis*

S2M-2245 Mike Rumbles: Pay-outs from Skipton Fund—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement of pay-outs of £20,000 to 400 people infected by hepatitis C through transfusion of infected blood products; notes that it was pressure from the Parliament which forced the UK Government to act, and further notes that, without devolution, these £8 million payments would not be happening. Supported by: George Lyon, Iain Smith, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Jamie Stone, Donald Gorrie, Mike Pringle, Jeremy Purvis
S2M-2245 Pay-outs from Skipton Fund (lodged on 12 January 2005) John Swinburne*
